20101219063111.000|20101219063113.000|CCO|THE DISTRICT ATTORNEY'S OFFICE
20101219063113.000|20101219063115.000|CCO|THAT COULD SNATCH AWAY WHAT I
20101219063115.000|20101219063117.000|CCO|HAVE AT ANY SECOND.
20101219063117.000|20101219063119.000|CCO|SO, LIKE, I DEFINITELY FEEL
20101219063119.000|20101219063121.000|CCO|SHACKLED.
20101219063121.000|20101219063123.500|CCO|>> Reporter: FROM SEPTEMBER
